text: Thomas Paul Salmon (August 19, 1932 - January 14, 2025) was an American Democratic Party politician. He served as the 75th Governor of Vermont from 1973 to 1977. Salmon died in Brattleboro, Vermont on January 14, 2025 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Lawyers from Vermont Category:Governors of Vermont Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:Lawyers from Cleveland
title: Thomas P. Salmon
